t: Amazon to expand ships-in-own-packaging push in 2024 | Packaging Dive
s: September 20, 2023 - Products certified to ship in their own packaging can be eligible for lower fulfillment fees. Last year the e-commerce giant shipped 11% of its items globally without added Amazon packaging.

t: FBA shipment status still "ready to ship"
